mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SUN_JOB_RELATIVE WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id} and RELATIVE_MASTER_ID = #{relative_master_id}
mapper.select: SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000005' AND DETAIL_ID = A.EDUCATION) AS EDUCATION_NAME , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000012' AND DETAIL_ID = A.DIFFICULTY) AS DIFFICULTY_NAME , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_NAME , COMPANY_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_NAME , COMPANY_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_1),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_1_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_2),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_2_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_3),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_3_NAME , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM SUN_JOB A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID

SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000005' AND DETAIL_ID = A.EDUCATION) AS EDUCATION_NAME , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000012' AND DETAIL_ID = A.DIFFICULTY) AS DIFFICULTY_NAME , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_NAME , COMPANY_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_NAME , COMPANY_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_1),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_1_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_2),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_2_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_3),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_3_NAME , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME FROM ESS_JOB A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID

SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000005' AND DETAIL_ID = A.EDUCATION) AS EDUCATION_NAME , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000012' AND DETAIL_ID = A.DIFFICULTY) AS DIFFICULTY_NAME , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT from SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1)) AS COMPANY_1_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1 )) AS COMPANY_1_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_MAIN_PRODUCT , COMPANY_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2)) AS COMPANY_2_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2 )) AS COMPANY_2_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_MAIN_PRODUCT , COMPANY_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3)) AS COMPANY_3_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM SUN_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3 )) AS COMPANY_3_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM SUN_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_MAIN_PRODUCT , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_1),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_1_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_2),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_2_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_3),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_3_NAME , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT from SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS UPLOAD_FILE_IMAGE , (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS ATTACH_FILE_DESCRIPTION FROM SUN_JOB A WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id}

SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000005' AND DETAIL_ID = A.EDUCATION) AS EDUCATION_NAME , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000012' AND DETAIL_ID = A.DIFFICULTY) AS DIFFICULTY_NAME , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1)) AS COMPANY_1_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1 )) AS COMPANY_1_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_1),"") AS COMPANY_1_MAIN_PRODUCT , COMPANY_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2)) AS COMPANY_2_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2 )) AS COMPANY_2_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_2),"") AS COMPANY_2_MAIN_PRODUCT , COMPANY_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = (SELECT UPLOAD_FILE_ID FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3)) AS COMPANY_3_LOGO , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000014' AND DETAIL_ID = (SELECT SIZE FROM ESS_COMPANY WHERE COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3 )) AS COMPANY_3_SIZE , IFNULL((SELECT ADDRESS FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_ADDRESS , IFNULL((SELECT MAIN_PRODUCT FROM ESS_COMPANY B WHERE B.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_3),"") AS COMPANY_3_MAIN_PRODUCT , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_1),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_1_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_2),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_2_NAME , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_JOB B WHERE B.JOB_ID = A.FUTURE_CAREER_3),"") AS FUTURE_CAREER_3_NAME , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS UPLOAD_FILE_IMAGE , (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS ATTACH_FILE_DESCRIPTION FROM ESS_JOB A WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id}

SELECT DETAIL_INDEX , MASTER_ID , PARENT_ID , DETAIL_ID , NAME , DETAIL_DESCRIPTION , USE_YN FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000006' AND DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT RELATIVE_DETAIL_ID FROM SUN_JOB_RELATIVE WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id} )

SELECT DETAIL_INDEX , MASTER_ID , PARENT_ID , DETAIL_ID , NAME , DETAIL_DESCRIPTION , USE_YN FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000006' AND DETAIL_ID IN (SELECT RELATIVE_DETAIL_ID FROM ESS_JOB_RELATIVE WHERE JOB_ID = #{job_id} )

SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , MAJOR , LICENSE_ID , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , COMPANY_2 , COMPANY_3 , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS UPLOAD_FILE_IMAGE , (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM SUN_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS ATTACH_FILE_DESCRIPTION FROM SUN_JOB A WHERE RANKING = 'Y' ORDER BY RANK_UPDATE_DATE

SELECT JOB_ID , CATEGORY_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000002' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_ID) AS CATEGORY_NAME , CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000003' AND MENU_ID = 'M000003' AND DETAIL_ID = A.CATEGORY_DETAIL_ID) AS CATEGORY_DETAIL_NAME , OCCUPATION , (SELECT NAME FROM COMMON_CODE_DETAIL WHERE MASTER_ID = 'M000004' AND DETAIL_ID = A.OCCUPATION) AS OCCUPATION_NAME , NAME , DEFINITION , DESCRIPTION , EDUCATION , MAJOR , LICENSE_ID , CAREER , DIFFICULTY , KNOWLEDGE , SKILL , ATTITUDE , SALARY_LEVEL , PROSPECT , RANKING , RELATED_JOB , RELATED_OCCUPATION , KECO , COMPANY_1 , COMPANY_2 , COMPANY_3 , FUTURE_CAREER_1 , FUTURE_CAREER_2 , FUTURE_CAREER_3 , UPLOAD_FILE_ID , IFNULL((SELECT NAME FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID),"") AS UPLOAD_FILE_NAME , (SELECT BINARY_CONTENT FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FIlE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS UPLOAD_FILE_IMAGE , (SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM ESS_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID = A.UPLOAD_FILE_ID) AS ATTACH_FILE_DESCRIPTION FROM ESS_JOB A WHERE RANKING = 'Y' ORDER BY RANK_UPDATE_DATE
